descriptions: ['DescriptionIf you have always dreamed of living right on one of the best beaches in the world, reality can trump your dream at Jumeirah Beach Residence. Located just south Dubai Marina, JBR sits right on Arabian Gulf. It was designed to become one of the Middle East’s premier residential and vacation spots and it hasn’t let its initial target down! Beachfront cafes, world-class hotels, delightful shopping experience, excellent walking environment are here to entertain you.\nThis community is vibrant and dynamic both night and day, thanks to its key feature, a beautiful stretch of beach, that runs parallel to the community and includes parking, retail, and food options; in addition, The Walk at JBR is a series of restaurants, cafes, retail shops, beauty salons, and other convenience outlets built on the ground floor level of the residential towers\nThe swimming pools and gym are on the plaza level access, with the security entrance and access to retails shops, restaurants, and supermarkets, others']

descriptions:
['Descriptionnu Avenue Real Estate is proud to offer this stunning Type 3 villa in Savannah, Arabian Ranches. The property comprises of 5 large bedrooms and sits on a beautifully landscaped plot with a large pool and Jacuzzi, both with cooling. The villa has undergone extensive renovation whilst boasting panoramic views of the golf course.
\xa0
There is a large, bright open living and dining area which has been finished with slate flooring and LED lighting throughout. The designer kitchen has been completely modified which includes a\xa0Siemens\xa0oven and dishwasher, as well as an LG fridge. Of the 5 bedrooms, one is situated on the ground floor having an en-suite bathroom, making it ideal for guests.
\xa0
Upstairs is home to 4 large bedrooms, The master and second bedroom both have en-suite bathrooms, with the further two share a ‘Jack and Jill’ style bathroom, with each bathroom throughout the villa having been completely re-designed.
\xa0
This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a fully upgraded villa to such an impressive finish. To arrange a viewing please call Solly on +971525724447.
- 5 large bedrooms 
- Chilled pool and Jacuzzi

["DescriptionSam McCone from McCone Properties is pleased to offer this 1 bedroom apartment in Boulevard Central, Downtown Dubai.

It is currently rented and is therefore ideal for an investor looking for an immediate rental return as well as a safe investment as it's located in the heart of Downtown.
Boulevard Central is ideal for those who want easy access to Dubai's hottest shopping and entertainment amenities, such as The Dubai Mall, Burj Dubai Square and Downtown Burj Dubai. It includes everything from secured parking, health & fitness centre as well as a children's play area.

~ A very popular and simple layout

It\xa0features themed hotels, villas,\xa0Engel & Voelkers is one of the worlds leading service companies specializing in the brokerage of residential and commercial properties, yachts and aviation, with 800 offices in over 30 countries.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionEdwards and Towers presents this tastefully and recently upgraded 3 bedroom plus maids room apartment in Shams 1, JBR.Apartment features- Upgraded kitchen, bathrooms and flooring- Spacious layout- Marina and partial sea view- Middle floor- En suite master bedroom- Maids room with attached bathroom- 2 VIP parking spaces- Vacant on transferJumeirah Beach Residences, a masterplan development from Dubai Properties, offers the opportunity to experience city and waterfront living at its finest. The project is split into six communities: Murjan, Sadaf, Amwaj, Rimal, Bahar and Shams. Boasting a wide range of luxury and mid-range apartments, JBR provides a great community environment for all residents. Benefitting from a prominent location directly on the beach with sea views, the community boasts a wide range of retail options including The Beach outdoor retail mall, and The Walk.']
